snippet: Making good on a pledge from last year, the president announced the establishment of an institute in North Carolina that he said would reinvigorate the nation’s manufacturing economy.
lead_paragraph: Making good on a pledge from last year, the president announced the establishment of an institute in North Carolina that he said would reinvigorate the nation’s manufacturing economy.

headline.main: Obama Announces Institute to Create Manufacturing Jobs
headline.print_headline: Obama Announces Institute to Create Manufacturing Jobs
